official_title: To amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to require the Resolution Trust Corporation to maintain residential properties of institutions for which the Corporation is conservator or receiver in compliance with local property maintenance and safety laws.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to require the Resolution Trust Corporation, in its capacity as conservator or receiver of occupied residential real property, to comply with State housing law standards for safety, sanitation, or habitability.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to require the Resolution Trust Corporation to maintain residential properties of institutions for which the Corporation is conservator or receiver in compliance with local property maintenance and safety laws.
